short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office chairs to ISC - Gatineau, QC
description: This bid is to supply, install and deliver office seating to the Indigenous Services Canada - Gatineau, QC location. Delivery is required prior to August 30th, 2014.
full_summary:
## Chairs Invitation - PSIB Suppliers (SA Holders)
### Call for Quotation
We are inviting eligible PSIB Suppliers (SA Holders) to submit quotations for the supply, delivery, and installation of office chairs and accommodation furniture to Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) in Gatineau, QC.

### Tender Details
* Reference Number: cb-26-5663573
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: 1000260139
* Publication Date: July 12, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 25, 2024 at 1:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: August 30, 2024
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR) and Canada

### Tender Description
ISC is seeking bidders to supply and install office furniture, including office seating, in line with the requirements outlined in the detailed solicitation documents. This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and requires bidders to be PSIB Suppliers (SA Holders).

### Required Documents and Information
* All interested PSIB Suppliers (SA Holders) must be pre-qualified and have an existing Supply Arrangement (SA) to be eligible to submit a bid. 
* Detailed solicitation documents, including Request for Proposal (RFP) and tender notices, can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS).

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or Requests for Clarification (RFC), please contact:
* Allaa Shaat, Procurement Officer
* Email: soumissionbid@sac-isc.gc.ca
* Phone: (873) 455-1260

### Technical Requirements
* RFSA # E60PQ-120001/H and the detailed solicitation documents outline the technical requirements and evaluation criteria for this procurement.

### Miscellaneous
* No security associated with this requirement
* Quotations must be submitted electronically using the GETS system
